card.text: Flying When Watcher in the Mist enters the battlefield, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on the top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Watery Grave
card.text: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.) As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, Watery Grave enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Whisper Agent
card.text: Flash When Whisper Agent enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Whispering Snitch
card.text: Whenever you surveil for the first time each turn, Whispering Snitch deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Wojek Bodyguard
card.text: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.) Wojek Bodyguard can't attack or block alone.
